item.title: Slippery mess on pavement and property, 27th September
item.description:
I have made numerous complaints regarding a large tree outside my property 9 eden way BR33DN. This three is depositing a large amount of fruit on the pavement ,my drive and cars there is now a pile of sticky mess in the road gully and pavement which will cause slip hazard . Please send operatives to clear mess and prun tree to a reasonable size. S kent
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Way, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs pruning and is overhanging on to my property, 27th September
item.description:

item.title: Gap in fence means anyone can get in, 27th September
item.description:
